title: SEUS PTGI HRR Test光影在1.14.4中运行出现黑屏
author: KM_Studio
txt_content:
SEUS PTGI HRR Test光影在1.14.4中运行出现黑屏，错误代码为Error: Invalid program “composite 7”
OptiFine版本为HD_U_F5





file_1597484267000.jpg (24.86 KB, 下载次数: 0)

replies.author: zay2410
replies.txt_content:
KM_Studio 发表于 2020-8-15 18:42
我禁用高清修复以后就没有光影选项了
Compatibility with AMD GPUs is being actively worked on. You will still experience some minor visual bugs, and you may experience random crashing. If you experience crashing while trying to load the game or enable SEUS PTGI, try doing so first in windowed mode, with a small window.

Compatibility with Intel GPUs is not guaranteed or planned at all!

replies.author: KM_Studio
replies.txt_content:
PercyDan 发表于 2020-8-15 17:41
是AMD显卡吗
对，在上个版本E12中运行没有问题，作者说下个版本会优化AMD显卡的性能，难道这个版本AMD显卡不能运行吗？

replies.author: KM_Studio
replies.txt_content:
yugeyuge 发表于 2020-8-15 18:02
把高清修复删了试试
高清修复删了就不能装光影了啊。。。

replies.author: yugeyuge
replies.txt_content:
试试，我在1.7以前也是这个问题
删了高清修复就可以了

replies.txt_content:
